name: Unstable: Search & Rescue
description:
In Unstable: Search & Rescue you need to find the trapped surviving colonists in deep unstable caverns! There are 3 missions total.

This is a strategy game where you do not control units directly, but instead give tasks to them by clicking on your target and selecting an option directly. They will then go and perform the task if they are idle.

Your Rovers will automatically head back to a Power Relay point if they are low on power. You can build more Power Relays to expand your power range. You can also build Lights to light-up the dark caverns to find those lost Colonists.

Hope you enjoy and watch out for the unstable terrain!

Controls:

All control options are on the screen. Space Bar to move camera back to main Teleporter.

Help menu can be accessed from Escape or F10.

F11 to switch to windowed mode.

Click on rock walls, rubble or structures to get mmore information about them and their available task assignments.

Game is made using Unreal Engine. If you require the pre-reqs it is under:  ExtractLocation\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us\UE4PrereqSetup_x64.exe
